subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Coaches and Managers
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
Colleges and Universities
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Mike Rice’s dismissal after the release of a video did little to quiet critics, who called for the jobs of university officials and asked why Mr. Rice was not fired sooner.
snippet: Mike Rice’s dismissal after the release of a video did little to quiet critics, who called for the jobs of university officials and asked why Mr. Rice was not fired sooner.
